chapters.title: Chapter 41:  An Unexpected AllyChapter 42:  Stronger than Blood
chapters.info: Danelle, p. 638—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah, the only Brown sister among Elaida's group of followers and advisors that deposed Siuan. She is young, but is nonetheless the typical Brown, often slight and seemingly lost in her own thoughts. She has no friends, even among the Browns, preferring to keep to herself. Perhaps because of this tendency, Mesaana killed her and used her identity to conceal herself inside the Tower. It is not known whether Danelle was already dead and her identity stolen when Siuan was deposed, or whether Danelle did that particular action on her own. Based on the timeline, she was likely replaced before the Tower broke.
